dataset_id.Description: identifier from the original study (Jaeger et al. 2020: maj_...;Holtze et al. 2021: bjh_...)

attended_ch.Description: side to which participants were instructed to attend to

Levels.left: participants were instructed to attend to the left story
Levels.right: participants were instructed to attend to the right story

con_order.Description: order of sound presentation mode during block 2-4 in Holtze et al. (2021). O stands for a block in omnidirectional mode (both audio books were equally loud). B stands for a block presented in beamformer mode (attended audio book was louder than ignored one).

Levels.OBOB: block 2: omnidirectional, block 3: beamformer, block 4: omnidirectional, block 5: beamformer
Levels.BOBO: block 2: beamformer, block 3: omnidirectional, block 4: beamformer, block 5: omnidirectional

selected_bl.Description: blocks in which both audio streams were equally loud
